programme.title: The City that Waits
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines how power supply issues in San Francisco now eclipse earthquakes.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines how earthquakes in San Francisco are over shadowed by power problems, and reflects on President George W. Bush's reduction in foreign policy.
